title: Claire's Corner Copia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Italian, Organic, Take-out, Mexican, Kosher
description: A funky cafeteria-style place where you bus-your-own table. Offers specials of the day, soups, burritos, breads, and desserts. Vegan food options are marked "V" and sometimes include sheperd's pie, lemon cake, "meatloaf," falafel, and salads. Wholegrain pancakes are served on weekends. NOTE: maybe serves fish on occasion, please verify and let HappyCow know.
